text: 20Q is a game where somebody thinks of an object and the goal is to figure out what it is in 20 questions or fewer. It is available as a handheld game, a website, and a game show. It usually starts out by asking whether the object is an "animal, vegetable, mineral, or other". == Related pages == * Akinator == Other websites == 20Q website Category:Games Category:English-language television programs
title: Twenty Questions
